homeDescription: HealthChallenge is an application dedicated to promoting health and well-being. Here you'll find information, products, and resources to better care for your body and quality of life. Explore our orthopedic solutions and discover how we can help you live with more comfort and health!

Products developed to assist in preventi: Products developed to assist in prevention and return of activities, in the treatment and recovery of patients with orthopedic injuries.
Family focused on extracting the benefit: Family focused on extracting the benefits of Neoprene. Thermal, compressive and elastic properties: these are the three properties that make Neoprene an effective tool in the treatment and prevention of injuries in orthopedic treatment.
productCodeDescription: The Hidrolight Splint Bilateral Orthosis is made of Plush neoprene, with thermal insulating properties and an elegant plush finish. It has wide adjustment capacity due to the fabric's adherence. At rest, the orthosis is pre-adjusted, with thumb closure and an elastic membrane that works as a pocket, facilitating placement by the patient themselves. The internal splints are easily adjustable to adapt to the desired hand. Two removable splints are provided, one with an ideal curvature to support the wrist to the palm of the hand, and the second straight on the dorsal part of the wrist, preventing up and down movements. The adherent elastic wraps around the joint, providing compression according to medical indication and patient need.
level3Description: Recovery and treatment of SEVERE injuries
